function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of technical language without context","Impact":"Misinterpretation of information, leading to incorrect actions or decisions.","Mitigation":"Provide clear and detailed explanations of technical terms and concepts.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Readers, researchers, and practitioners in the field of image processing and computer vision.","Owner":"Researchers, authors, and publishers of technical documents."}]}
